name: Santa Clara County Library District Surplus Property Donations
description: Donated surplus library property including furniture, shelving, and equipment for eligible nonprofit organizations located within Santa Clara County
fullDescription: The Santa Clara County Library District donates surplus library property to nonprofit organizations located within the county.
whatTheyOffer:
- Library shelving and display units
- Furniture (tables, chairs, desks)
- Library equipment
- Technology items (when available)
- Other surplus library property
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit in Santa Clara County
2. Apply through the library district website
3. Describe your organization and intended use
4. Wait for notification of available surplus
5. Arrange pickup of approved items
